title: Brexit’s Slow‑Burn Hit to the UK Economy
description: A new analysis finds that Brexit imposed higher costs on the UK than forecasts at the time projected.
content: Yves here. We warned back in the day that Brexit would impose a meaningful growth cost on the UK. The imposition of a hard border created trade frictions and increased costs of doing business with th… [+12879 chars]
